SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Taking care of your household responsibilities?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Care of Household Responsibilities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Concentrating for Ten Minutes

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - What is your current marital status?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Current Marital Status

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD1-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, for how many days were you totally unable to carry out your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: WD1-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Days Unable to Carry Out Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD1-Dealing With People You Do Not Know
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Dealing with people you do not know?
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: WD1-Dealing With People You Do Not Know
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Dealing With People You Do Not Know

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - Which describes your main work status best?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Describes Main Work Status Best

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: How much have you been emotionally affected by your health problems?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Emotionally Affected by Health

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Getting dressed?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Getting Dressed

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - How Many Days Difficulties Present

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, not counting the days that you were totally unable, for how many days did you cut back or reduce your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - How Many Days Reduce Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - How old are you now?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - How Old Are You Now

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Learning a New Task

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - Living situation at time of interview.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Living Situation at Interview

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Maintaining a friendship?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Maintaining a Friendship

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: How much of a problem did you have joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Problem Joining Community Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - Record sex as observed.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Observed Sex

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Standing for Long Periods

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Walking a Long Distance

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Washing your whole body?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Washing Your Whole Body

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - How many years in all did you spend studying in school, college or university?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Years Studying in School or College

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Interviewer - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in: Your day-to-day work/school?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Interviewer-administered - Your Day-to-Day Work or School
